quote: I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it. – Vincent van Gogh
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
joke: We all know where the Big Apple is but does anyone know where the Minneapolis?
